debates.showAs: Public Health (Restriction on Sale of Stimulant Drinks to Children) Bill 2025: Second Stage
Public Health (Restriction on Sale of Stimulant Drinks to Children) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the sale, advertisement or promotion of the use of stimulant drinks to children, to prohibit the sale of stimulant drinks to persons under 18 years of age; to provide for health warnings on drink labelling to the general public on the effect to a person’s health of the excessive consumption or use of stimulant drink products and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh rialáil ar dheochanna spreagthacha a dhíol le leanaí nó a fhógairt do leanaí, nó ar úsáid deochanna spreagthacha a chur chun cinn do leanaí, do thoirmeasc deochanna spreagthacha a dhíol le daoine faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rabhaidh shláinte don phobal i gcoitinne a bheith ar lipéadú deochanna faoin éifeacht atá ag ró-ól nó ró-úsáid táirgí deochanna spreagthacha ar shláinte duine, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Public Health (Restriction on Sale of Stimulant Drinks to Children) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte Poiblí (Srian le Deochanna Spreagthacha a Dhíol le Leanaí), 2025

debates.showAs: Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act, in the interest of child protection, to require that access to pornographic material on the internet be subject to an age-verification requirement and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht, ar mhaithe le cosaint leanaí, dá cheangal go mbeidh rochtain ar ábhar pornagrafach ar an idirlíon faoi réir ceanglas fíoraithe aoise agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Children (Online Age Verification) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Leanaí (Fíorú Aoise ar Líne), 2024

debates.showAs: Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: Report and Final Stages
Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Health (Scoliosis Treatment Services) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to impose on the Health Service Executive certain special duties and powers in relation to the establishment of a specialised treatment service for the inpatient and outpatient treatment of children and adults of spinal scoliosis who are resident in the State and to confer certain duties and powers on the Minister for Health in relation to the service to be established and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’fhorchur dualgais agus cumhachtaí speisialta áirithe ar Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte i ndáil le sainseirbhís cóireála a bhunú chun cóireáil d’othar cónaithe agus d’othar seachtrach a chur ar leanaí agus ar dhaoine fásta a bhfuil scolóis dromlaigh orthu agus a bhfuil cónaí orthu sa Stát agus do thabhairt dualgais agus cumhachtaí áirithe don Aire Sláinte i ndáil leis an tseirbhís a bheidh le bunú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 2018 by means of extending the restrictions on those present in courtroom proceedings, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 trí na srianta a bheidh orthu siúd a bheidh i láthair in imeachtaí i seomra cúirte a leathnú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Safety, Health and Welfare at Work (Formaldehyde) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 to require the Health and Safety Authority to prepare and publish a code of practice under section 60 of that Act in respect of the safe use and disposal of formaldehyde, with particular reference to the embalming process; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005 chun a cheangal ar an Údarás Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta cód cleachtais a ullmhú agus a fhoilsiú faoi alt 60 den Acht sin maidir le húsáid shábháilte agus diúscairt shábháilte formaildéid, ag tagairt go háirithe do phróiseas an bhalsamaithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Safety, Health and Welfare at Work (Formaldehyde) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair (Formaildéad), 2024

debates.showAs: Special Measures in the Public Interest (Derrybrien Wind Farm) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Special Measures in the Public Interest (Derrybrien Wind Farm) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act, in the public interest, to assist in maintaining the security of the electricity supply system in the State, and for that purpose to provide for the transfer to the western development commission of the Derrybrien wind farm; to effect the transfer of shares in Gort Windfarms Limited to the Western Development Commission; to provide for the removal of persons from certain offices positions or employment with Gort wind farms limited and provide for the appointment of persons to those offices or positions or that employment; to extinguish certain rights; to provide for the re-naming of Gort Wind Farms Limited; to provide for the transfer of the lessee’s interest in the lands at Derrybrien; to disapply certain provisions of the Companies Acts and other enactments in so far as they relate to Gort wind farms limited; to provide for the preservation of contracts; to provide for the making of regulations; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, chun cabhrú le slándáil an tsoláthair leictreachais sa Stát a chothabháil agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Feirm Ghaoithe Dharaidh Braoin a aistriú chuig Coimisiún Forbartha an Iarthair; do dhéanamh scaireanna in Gort Windfarms Limited a aistriú chuig Coimisiún Forbartha an Iarthair; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le daoine a chur as oifigí, poist nó fostaíocht áirithe le Gort Windfarms Limited agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le daoine a cheapadh chun na n-oifigí nó na bpost nó na fostaíochta sin; do mhúchadh cearta áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Gort Windfarms Limited a athainmniú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leas an léasaí sna tailte i nDaraidh Braoin a aistriú; do dhéanamh forálacha áirithe d’Achtanna na gCuideachtaí agus d’achtacháin eile a dhífheidhmiú a mhéid a bhaineann siad le Gort Windfarms Limited; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le conarthaí a choimeád ar marthain; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialacháin a dhéanamh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Special Measures in the Public Interest (Derrybrien Wind Farm) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bearta Speisialta ar mhaithe le Leas an Phobail (Feirm Ghaoithe Dharaidh Braoin), 2023

debates.showAs: Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Report and Final Stages
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Committee Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Disability (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Disability Act 2005 and the Equal Status Act 2000 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Gradam an Uachtaráin Bill 2023: Order for Second Stage
Gradam an Uachtaráin Bill 2023: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to facilitate the conferral by the State of an honour to be known as Gradam an Uachtaráin to recognise the exceptional achievements of its citizens and the outstanding contributions of others; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’éascú don Stát onóir a bhronnadh ar a dtabharfar Gradam an Uachtaráin chun éachtaí eisceachtúla a saoránach agus cion oibre suntasach daoine eile, a aithint; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Civil Liability (Schools) Bill 2023: Order for Second Stage
Civil Liability (Schools) Bill 2023: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law related to civil liability for schools.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le dliteanas sibhialta i leith scoileanna.

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Built Heritage Protection) Bill 2022: Second Stage
Planning and Development (Built Heritage Protection) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 to improve the level of protection afforded to Ireland’s built heritage, to prescribe the role of architectural conservation officers, to strengthen the protection afforded by architectural conservation area designation, to increase the enforcement mechanisms and penalties for breaches of planning legislation resulting in damage to built heritage and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 chun an leibhéal cosanta a thugtar d’oidhreacht thógtha na hÉireann a fheabhsú, d’fhorordú ról oifigeach caomhantais ailtireachta, do neartú na cosanta a thugtar le sainainmniú  mar limistéar caomhantais ailtireachta, do mhéadú na sásraí forfheidhmiúcháin agus na bpionós i leith sáruithe ar an reachtaíocht phleanála a mbeidh damáiste d’oidhreacht thógtha de thoradh orthu agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Built Heritage Protection) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Cosaint Oidhreachta Tógtha), 2022

debates.showAs: Registration of Wills Bill 2021: Second Stage
Registration of Wills Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the extension of the Civil Registration Service to the registration of certain information regarding wills and for those purposes to revise the law relating to the Civil Registration Service and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta a leathnú chuig clárú faisnéise áirithe maidir le huachtanna agus chun na gcríoch sin d'athmheas an dlí a bhaineann leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
